actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1256.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6806 to amend sections 46(f) and 167(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 regarding the treatment of public utility property and to provide a transitional rule with respect thereto.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6806 (IRS treatment of public property).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill H.R. 6806 to amend sections 46(f) and 167(1) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 regarding the treatment of public utility property and to provide a transitional rule with respect thereto.
